title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2465/86 of 31 July 1986 fixing, for the 1986/87 marketing year, the threshold prices for rice
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2465/86
of 31 July 1986
fixing, for 1986/87 marketing year, the threshold prices for rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The threshold price for broken rice is hereby fixed at 319,91 ECU per tonne.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 September 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 July 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President  // 582,83   // 773,89   // 851,51   //    //   //   //
